questions.text: Hey Thompson! I need a favour

answers.text: What is it going to be this time?

questions.text: Out victim was married;Can you arrest him or something?;I want to interrogate him

answers.text: You know how the law works, right?

questions.text: Sure, I believe it goes something like this;1. You break into his house;2. You take him into custody in his underwear;3. I speak with him

answers.text: Close enough;Tell you what...;We can get hold of him for a few hours only;So you'd better prepare something
